column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Being a native Chigagoan
column2: I've lived my life consuming great deep-dish pizza. Uno and Due are wonderful
column3: Gino's East used to be very good before LUEY acquired the chain
column4: Giordano's is about 7th on my list. HOWEVER
column5: Lou Malnati (former chef at UNO) created the perfect pie...
